meta_description: The Frances Young Tang Teaching Museum and Art Gallery at Skidmore College
hours_text:
#  Visit the Tang 

29° 

It’s 4:53 PM … and we’re open! 

Anchor name: Special Hours 

**Winter Break Hours**

  * December 16– January 18: Tuesday–Sunday, noon–5 pm

  * Regular hours resume January 20: Tuesday–Sunday, noon–5 pm; Thursdays until 9 pm 

**Note** : The last day to see [_See It Now_](/exhibitions/716-see-it-now-contemporary-art-from-the-ann-and-mel-schaffer-collection) was January 4; the next exhibition in that gallery is [_Kathy Butterly: Assume Yes_](/exhibitions/715-kathy-butterly-assume-yes), opening February 14. Check the [Exhibitions page](/exhibitions) to see what’s on view when you visit. 

Anchor name: Hours 

Hours 

Tuesday 12:00 – 5:00 PM

Wednesday 12:00 – 5:00 PM

Thursday 12:00 – 9:00 PM

Friday 12:00 – 5:00 PM

Saturday 12:00 – 5:00 PM

Sunday 12:00 – 5:00 PM

Closed Monday and major holidays 

* * *

**Admission**

Free! 

Suggested donation: 

Adults $5

Children over 12 $3

Seniors $2

* * *

**Contact**

Information: 518-580-8080

Tours: 518-580-5529

Email tang@skidmore.edu 

[Tang Staff List](/about/staff)

* * *

**Email Newsletter**

  * [Sign up for the Tang email newsletter](http://eepurl.com/FLtMv)  

###  Welcome!

**The Tang Teaching Museum is free and open to all!**

The Tang invites curiosity and active engagement with art and ideas. The Tang’s galleries function as exhibition spaces, lecture halls, performing arts venues, town halls, and laboratories for new ideas. All are welcome to explore what’s on view and expand their under...

Anchor name: Right Angle 

Winter Break Hours 

  * December 16– January 18: Tuesday–Sunday, noon–5 pm

  * Late Thursday hours resume January 22, when the museum is open until 9 pm 

**Note** : All gallery spaces are open except the Wachenheim Gallery, as we prepare [_Kathy Butterly: Assume Yes_](/exhibitions/715-kathy-butterly-assume-yes), opening February 14. Check the [Exhibitions page](/exhibitions) to see what’s on view when you visit. 

* * *

Dig deeper into the website for [Exhibitions](/exhibitions), [Events](/calendar), [Publications](/publications), [Tang collection](/collection), and [Art & Ideas](/education/art-and-ideas).
